newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Ng Fung Hong mulls grape winery purchase.
newsitem.headline: Ng Fung Hong mulls grape winery purchase.

text.p: Foodstuff distributor Ng Fung Hong Ltd said on Monday it was in talks to buy a grape winery in China and a fishing company in West Africa.
"The company is currently in negotiation with an independent third party regarding a possible acquisition of certain interests in a grape winery in China," it said in a statement.
"The negotiation is still at a preliminary stage and no formal agreement has been reached," it said.
Ng Fung Hong also said negotiation regarding the acquistion of a fishing company was still in progress and no terms had been agreed.
"The acquisition, if materialises, will constitute a notifiable transaction for the company," it said.
Shares of Ng Fung Hong rose HK$0.25 to HK$9.00 in early trade.
